sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'histoire moderne est pleine de changements.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Modern history is full of changes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī bù jīngdiǎn de diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un film classique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a classic movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ sòng shàng zuì zhēnchéng de zhùfú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vous adresse mes vœux les plus sincères.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I send my most sincere blessings.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils discutent dans le bar.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They are chatting in the bar.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il possède des capacités de leadership.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He possesses leadership abilities.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fête nationale dure sept jours de congé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: National Day has a seven-day holiday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wáng tàitai shì yī wèi lǎoshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Madame Wang est enseignante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Mrs. Wang is a teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants posent des questions activement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The students actively ask questions.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les invités arrivent les uns après les autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The guests arrive one after another.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhōumò yǒu yī gè jùhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons une réunion ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have a gathering this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu as fait un excellent travail !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You did a great job!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在剧中扮演主要角色。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài jù zhōng bànyǎn zhǔyào juésè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il joue le rôle principal dans la pièce.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He plays the main role in the play.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pièce a beaucoup d'espace.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room has a lot of space.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est la comptable de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is the company's accountant.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 由此可见，他说的是真话。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yóucǐ kějiàn, tā shuō de shì zhēnhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est donc évident qu'il dit la vérité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: From this, it can be seen that he is telling the truth.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gouvernement a publié une nouvelle politique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The government has issued a new policy.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 人们抗议不公平的待遇。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rénmen kàngyì bù gōngpíng de dàiyù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gens protestent contre le traitement injuste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: People protest against unfair treatment.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'investissement comporte toujours des risques.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Investment always carries risks.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhāng zhuōzi gāo qīshí límǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette table mesure soixante-dix centimètres de haut.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This table is seventy centimeters tall.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez partir d'ici immédiatement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please leave here immediately.
